sources.title: Nine Days of One Year
sources.description:
The story takes place in the 1960s. Young nuclear scientists, obsessive experimenter Gusev, and skeptical theoretical physicist Kulikov are longtime friends who are in love with a girl named Lelya. As a result of scientific experiments, Gusev receives a life-threatening dose of radiation. Doctors' warnings about the danger threatening his life do not stop the scientist in search of scientific truth, perhaps the last for him.

IMDb rating: 7.5

Year of production: 1961

Director: Romm Mikhail
Writers: Daniil Khrabrovitsky, Mikhail Romm
Composer: John Ter-Tatevosyan
Cinematographer: German Lavrov
Production Designer: Georgy Kolganov

Cast: Smoktunovsky Innokenty, Evstigneev Evgeny, Ovchinnikova Luciena, Batalov Alexei, Voitsik Ada, Lavrova Tatyana, Teterin Evgeny, Plotnikov Nikolai, Grabbe Nikolay, Blinnikov Sergey, Sergeev Nikolai, Kozakov Mikhail, Belyaeva Valentina, Batyreva Natalya

metadata.Plot: Two young scientists are exploring new fields of nuclear physics. Dmitry Gusev and Ilya Kulikov are good friends, but rivals in love. Dmitry marries Lyolya and they live happily together. Luck has it that he makes an important discovery. Unfortunately he exposes himself to radioactivity during the experiments. As a result he falls seriously ill. However Dmitry has a strong spirit. His will to live, the deep passion for his work and his strong love for mankind makes it possible for him to recover.
metadata.Actors: Aleksey Batalov, Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy, Tatyana Lavrova
